definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I am a simple man who enjoys a simple life with his family.
sentences.chinese: 我仅是个与家人享受着平凡的小日子的普通人。

sentences.english: Yury Zhirkov has a tight calf muscle and is out.
sentences.chinese: 小日子的小腿肌肉有点小伤。

sentences.english: Everyone else is too busy living his own little mini drama.
sentences.chinese: 而其他人都只围着自己的小日子转罢了。

definition: How are you getting by?/How's life?/contraction of 過得去|过得去, can get by/tolerably well/not too bad
to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along
wife, kids and a warm bed (idiom)/the simple and good life
pinyin: lao3 po2 hai2 zi5 re4 kang4 tou5

definition: world with only two people (usually refers to a romantic couple)/romantic couple's world
free and at leisure (idiom); unfettered/outside the reach of the law (of criminal)/at large
tight (i.e. lacking money)/hard up/same as 緊巴巴|紧巴巴
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
